description: Improving institutional capacity and monitoring capabilities at central and local level for decreasing vulnerability of Roma in Western Balkans

subproject.description: Providing more targeted, effective and efficient actions for decreasing Roma poverty and exclusion through the Governments’ commitments to meeting the Millennium Development Goals, their efforts to move closer to EU membership criteria and standards as well as to their commitments within the Decade of Roma Inclusion.
subproject.title: Decreasing Roma vulner. REG

subproject.description: Poverty reduction in targeted Roma communities through ensuring improved and sustainable social inclusion, better employment and development opportunities.
subproject.title: Decreasing Roma vulner. MNE

subproject.title: Decreasing Roma vulner. MNE

subproject.description: Support to the Government of Serbia and other relevant stakeholders to address in a sustainable manner the problem of vulnerability in the country.
subproject.title: Decreasing Roma vulner. SRB

subproject.description: Strengthening capacities of central and local authorities in developing and implementing policies addressing Roma, Ashkalia, Egiptian issues, strengthening Roma, Ashkalia, Egiptian Community participation in the process of decision making, livelihood stability and strengthening community and municipal capacity through the community initiatives that involve Roma, Ashkalia, Egiptian.
subproject.title: Decreasing Roma vulnerability
